dimension: 15 1/4 x 47 1/4 in. (38.74 x 120.02 cm) (sleeve to sleeve)
title: Ceremonial blouse
description: Red body with cross stitch in green, yellow, black, and white; beads; blue sleeves with multicoulored cross stitch pattern and beads; front and back decorated.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
